title: Wotaku ni Koi wa Muzukashii Comic Anthology
description:
Minekura Kazuya ([Saiyuki](https://mangadex.org/title/cc8643f2-5ede-4b0a-9bcd-8994a201b45b/)), Azusa Kina ([After School at the Coffee Shop](https://mangadex.org/title/eab8c668-0030-413d-97f9-c6f0cae8ed42/)), Namori ([YuruYuri](https://mangadex.org/title/6306c976-d776-48c3-b29f-d345e65f272b)), etc... A splendid writing team participates!
The official comic anthology of the popular manga [Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku](https://mangadex.org/title/65263bf9-4f87-4513-b72f-ad6436b3911c), which has sold a total of over 9 million copies (including digital editions)!

---

Contributors:
Cover: Fujita
Illustrations: Akiyoshi Shima, Sachiko, Namori, Haida Nanako
Manga: 
1. Azusa Kina
2. Konno Paru
3. Hachiya Kujira
4. Shiromanta
5. Yamaguchi Eito
6. Dorokawa Megumi
7. Kakitsubata Waka
8. Nagao Uka
9. Anno
10. Tachi Aoi
11. Medamayaki
12. Nouichi Nye
13. Minami Kiri
14. Megane
15. Asahi Noboru
16. Minekura Kazuya
